name: Grouper
description:
Made in 3.5 hours for Trijam 150 with the theme "Grouping".

Click and drag to select a group of adjacent shapes. Valid groups all share either their shape, color, or pattern.  If the group you select is valid, you will get points and the timer will be replenished. Your goal is to stay alive as long as possible and accumulate the most points.

Tip: large groupings reward significantly more points and time, so try to find really big individual groups instead of lots of small ones.

All design, programming, art, and sound by Levi Pinkert
